Delightes for ladies to adorne their persons, tables, closets, and distillatories with beauties, banquets, perfumes and waters. Plat, Hugh, Sir, 1552-1611?
[192] p.
Printed by Peter Short, At London : 1602.
"Reade, practise, and censure." Signatures: A-H¹². Text within ornamental border. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
